data.description:
PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Appended/Tac Mag + Explosive Payload/Rewind Rounds + Frenzy/Adrenaline Junkie/Firefly

Frenzy is +50 to reload, so that perk alone puts Fatebringer at max reload speed. Loader will still add a scalar so it will be faster.

Rolls are all about perk synergy so here are some notes on perk synergy re Fatebringer.
Kill Clip does not boost Explosive Payload damage, just the impact damage
Explosive and Firefly is the OG combo, but Explosive sometimes interferes with Firefly explosions
Good PvE Combos:
Explosive + Frenzy
Rewind + Frenzy/Firefly
Osmosis + AJ (?)
Suboptimal PvE combos, but good perks
Rewind + Kill Clip
Explosive + Kill Clip

PvP: Hammer/Corkscrew + Accurized + Killing Wind/Explosive Payload/Tunnel Vision + KC/Opening Shot

Kill Clip does not improve TTK - just forgiveness and effective range
PvP “God Roll” Hammer/(Range Barrel) + Accurized + Explosive + Opening Shot + Range MW
